Reviews.Title: wooow just wooow.. i love this tv
Reviews.Author: falcom3
Reviews.Content: first off im using it as a monitor with just vga. ive never seen such an awesome picture on a tv in my life.. i didnt think it could get any better. then i hooked it up to my hd cable box with hdmi.. and holy smoke even better.. i do not have 1 complaint about this tv at 199.99

ProductInfo.Features:
Brilliant LED images with low power consumption
SRS TruSurround XT sound performance for unmatched audio
Seamless connectivity with 3 HDMI inputs and Easylink
High Definition Resolution
Energy Star rated for low power consumption
ProductInfo.Name: Philips 24PFL4508/F7 24-Inch 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
